mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure images are optimized and the layout adjusts seamlessly to smaller screen sizes for a better mobile experience.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider optimizing large images and implementing lazy loading to improve page speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve keyword targeting, meta descriptions, and add structured data to improve search engine rankings.
userExperienceTip: Ensure the navigation menu is consistent and easy to find on all pages to enhance user experience.
